typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Growr. - Pond is not active anymore"

arguments.value: Growr. - Pond is not active anymore

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Growr. - Pond is not active anymore"

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Types.PondCriteria storage ref[] storage ref
tuple(struct Types.PondParams storage ref,struct Types.PondCriteria storage ref[] storage ref,uint256,uint256)

documentation.text:
Checks if the user is eligible for borrowing a loan.
If some of the input params are not in the pond capabilities,
it returns the most suitable loan the user can borrow at that time
